title: Oodles of flavour straight from South India!
directions: Heat the oil in a pan, add the chopped onions and sauté till golden brown. Now add the garlic and ginger and stir for a few minutes. Add the turmeric powder, cayenne pepper, coriander powder, curry leaves and crushed black peppercorns.
Stir in the tomatoes, add salt and continue to cook while constantly stirring for about five minutes.

Add in the chicken and cover the pan with a lid, simmer for about thirty minutes; (don’t forget to keep checking on the chicken from time to time, add a little water if it begins to stick to the bottom of the pan). Once cooked through and dry, turn off the heat and serve hot with naan or parantha.
ingredients: 1 small piece of ginger , finely chopped
1 whole boneless chicken (500 grams) cut into pieces
